azurerm_data_lake_store_file.description: Manages a Azure Data Lake Store File.

account_name.description: Specifies the name of the Data Lake Store for which the File should created.

local_file_path.description: The path to the local file to be added to the Data Lake Store.

remote_file_path.description: The path created for the file on the Data Lake Store.

id.description: The ID of the Data Lake Store File.

create.description: Used when creating the Data Lake Store File.

update.description: Used when updating the Data Lake Store File.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Data Lake Store File.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Data Lake Store File.
